description: Equip: Condemn causes the target to take 36% more damage from your next Mortal Strike, stacking up to 2 times.
Equip: Your Overpower has a 40% chance to reset the cooldown of Mortal Strike and reduce the Rage cost of your next Mortal Strike by 15.
Equip: Swiftmend no longer consumes a heal over time effect, and extends the duration of your heal over time effects on the target by 10 sec.
Equip: Feign Death cooldown reduced by 15.0 sec, and Feign Death now removes most negative status effects from yourself.
Equip: Replaces Templar's Verdict with Final Verdict, a devastating strike that deals 5,130 Holy damage. Has a 15% chance to activate Hammer of Wrath and reset its cooldown.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
Equip: Casting any Barrier spell grants the effects of Blazing Barrier, Ice Barrier, and Prismatic Barrier. Each absorb shield has 65% effectiveness.
Equip: Vanish reduces the remaining cooldown of your other abilities by 20 sec.
Equip: When you cast Earth Shock, gain Lava Surge and increase the damage of your next Lava Burst by 20%.

Equip: Mutilate deals an additional 45% Bleed damage over 8 sec.

Envenom damage increased by 5% for each Bleed you have on the target.
Equip: Wildfire Bomb drops an additional cluster of bombs around the target, each exploding for 768 Fire damage.

Equip: Circle of Healing reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Sanctify, Prayer of Mending reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Serenity, and Holy Fire reduces the cooldown of Holy Word: Chastise by 4 sec.
Equip: Holy Shock protects the target with a shield of Holy Light for 18 sec, absorbing damage equal to 20% of the Holy Shock every 6 sec. Can protect up to 5 targets.

Equip: Reduce the effectiveness of crowd controlling effects by 10%. Successfully applying a loss of control effect to an enemy, interrupting an enemy, or dispelling any target will increase all your secondary stats by 80 for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
